forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 21. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 31. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As night drapes its velvet cloak over Boston, a tranquil stillness blankets the city. The air is crisp, with a brisk west wind dancing through the streets, whispering secrets of the day to come. The current chill offers a perfect excuse to snuggle into a warm coat, perhaps accompanied by a soft scarf to ward off the cool breaths of the evening. Tonight’s partly cloudy silhouette beckons those with a penchant for night walks, inviting quiet moments under the stars, illuminated only by the distant twinkle of city lights.

Looking ahead to Wednesday, the horizon promises a revelatory dawn with sunshine flooding the landscape. The high will bring an invigorating warmth, coaxing residents outdoors to embrace the beauty of a new day. This is not a day for heavy layers but rather for light jackets that can be easily shed as the sun rises high. Whether one decides to explore the scenic paths along the Charles River, indulge in a leisurely coffee at a corner café, or simply stroll through the vibrant streets filled with the hum of life, the clarity and brightness of the day will uplift the spirits. It’s a delightful opportunity to reconnect with simple pleasures, all while basking in Boston’s radiant winter glow.
